document.full_text: they may be mostly the kind of low-wage positions disparaged by some highly paid economists and politicians as "mcjobs," but they drew a torrent of eager job-seekers on tuesday to the world's leading hamburger chain.
document.title: thousands show up to apply for fast-food "mcjobs"
lines_and_colors: they may be mostly the kind of low-wage positions disparaged by some highly paid economists and politicians as "mcjobs," but they drew a torrent of eager job-seekers on tuesday to the world's leading hamburger chain.
